about1: Club Penguin Plus is a recreation of Modern (2015-17) Style Club Penguin. It's fully playable on your browser using HTML5 and is completely free to play. With no features locked behind a paywall, you can play as much as you want. We are the first HTML5 Club Penguin server to support multiple languages and have a large community of players.
about2: We have an active and growing community to support our game. You can join us on Discord and Twitter, where you can be kept updated on the latest news and events, and interact with our dedicated playerbase, in our moderated and safe community, suitable for all ages, and in 3 different languages - English, Spanish and Portuguese

modernfeatures: Igloo system that allows players to design up to 4 igloos as well as a system for liking igloos, modern rooms, minigames,catalogs, and adventures to keep you busy!
challenges: Players can participate in daily and weekly challenges to earn special currency, which can then be used to purchase items in our rotating challenge market!
explore: Over 40 rooms to explore, each with its own unique theme and activities. Earn stamps by completing tasks and play minigames scattered around the island!
express: Players can express themselves and customize their penguin with one of 8 always available catalogs, featuring hundreds of obtainable items at launch.
finance2: We do not host advertisments on our site and so our income is entirely from player donations. You can see how many players donate, and what we take in per month on our
finance3: Club Penguin Plus costs a lot to run each month. At the current time, most of this is paid out of pocket as our outgoings greatly exceed our player donations. Here is a detailed overview of exactly where this money goes.
finance4: We host our game and web services with a provider called DigitalOcean. We diversify our services over many different resources to ensure the least downtime to our game when updating, as well as keeping your player data as safe as possible. At the current time, we use US$60/month in DigitalOcean resources to host our website, game and login servers, database and mediaserver.
finance5: Our automated email services, which are used for account verificiation, as well as resetting passwords and other neccesary communication are done through a service called SendGrid. This has a cost of US$19.95 per month.
finance6: For player communication via our support emails, and to keep our team organised, we Google Workspace.Each Google Workspace account costs US$6/month, and currently, we use 2 accounts, for a total of US$12/month.
finance7: To minimise disruption to our services, we use 3 different domain names: 'clubpenguin.plus', 'clubpenguinpl.us', and 'cpplus.pw'. These cost a total of US$52.44/year.
finance8: In summary, Club Penguin Plus currently costs US$97.32/month to run.
